original_text: For if the readiness is there, it is acceptable according to what a person has, not according to what he does not have.
korean_text: 할 마음만 있으면 있는 대로 받으실 터이요 없는 것은 받지 아니하시리라

sentences.original_text: For if the readiness is there,
according to what a person has,
not according to what he does not have.
